front.title: Besieged
front.gametext: Deploy on a captured starship. Your characters present with captured starship may battle opponent's characters aboard it (as if present together at a site). Effect canceled if starship escapes or is stolen.
front.lore: Stormtroopers blasted through the main airlock of the Tantive IV. The Rebel soldiers' attempt to defend the intrusion was no match for the Empire's superior firepower.

rulings: Besieged is canceled if Dark steals the starship.
The starship being a stolen starship currently owned by Light, does not cause Besieged to be canceled.
